front.title: Evaluation of existing GMPLS encoding against G.709v3 Optical Transport Networks (OTN)

abstract.t: ITU-T recommendation G.709 [G.709-2012] has introduced new fixed and flexible Optical Data Unit (ODU) containers in Optical Transport Networks (OTNs). This document provides an evaluation of existing Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) routing and signaling methods against the G.709 [G.709-2012] OTN networks.
